prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Synth Pad, Piano, Drums, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, and Chromatic Percussion, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Chromatic Percussion, Synth Pad, Piano, Drums, and Guitar, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This song has Drums, Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, and Chromatic Percussion, Organ not included.
